name: The Magical Star Guardians
description:
For the last 100 years stars have been disappearing one by one. Science has not yet discovered what is causing their untimely deaths. The nights are growing darker and darker every year and now even the constellations have disappeared from the night sky.

You play as Lucretia, a teenage girl attending her second year at a boarding school. She’s ready for another unassuming year with her friends, and so far so good. Sure there’s this weird new girl who’s been keeping eyes on her and sure the stars are dying all around them, but that's normal things that happen to teenagers, right?

The Magical Star Guardians is a puzzle RPG made in RPG Maker MZ for the Touch the Stars game jam. It is a Magical Girl game set in a 19th century alternate earth. The game is divided up in chapters. This jam entry contains the very first chapter.
